item1: ITEM 1 – BUSINESS Northern Trust Corporation Northern Trust Corporation (the “Corporation”) leading provider wealth management, asset servicing, asset management banking solutions corporations, institutions, families individuals. Corporation financial holding company conducting business through various U.S. non-U.S. subsidiaries, including Northern Trust Company (Bank).
item7: Compensation expense, largest component Noninterest Expense, increased 2024 2023, primarily due higher severance-related charges increase base pay adjustments. Severance-related charges $81.8 million 2024 compared $36.7 million 2023. Full-time equivalent employees totaled approximately 23,300 December 31, 2024, up 1% approximately 23,100 December 31, 2023. Outside Services expense 2024 increased 2023, primarily reflecting higher consulting services higher technical services.
